divs: Sighting Detailswell, i went outside to smoke. i looked up and noticed two large orange and reddish glowing orbs heading north. they both seemed to have a particular pattern. they would stop and hover for a minute or so then continue in the same direction. i ran into the house and got my wife to see it. she did not really know what to say about it. the orb at the furthest distance from me abruptly left out of sight, as the other sort hovered in one spot then soon followed. i thought it was all over.... i came back outside five minutes later and there where two more of the same orbs, following the exact same pattern as the last two. again i ran inside to get my wife. the only different that happen this time is the one furthest away this time suddenly dropped. i mean it completely dropped from sight. the second it dropped the other orb stopped and sat in one spot. it stayed there for about five minutes then took off. honestly i have very good eye sight and could see it leave from a very far distance. before it vanished it resembled a bright red star. i don't know what else to say except wow. p.s. i got 1 bad picture but you can see the orb as a ball of flames. and it just so happened that my camera malfunctioned after taking the video. there was no video when i put the SD card into the reader.... my camera just went on the frits for some reason. i attached the photo. zoom in.
